From looking at the code I don't see a possibility of NPE.  I believe you are 
using a VM with known JIT bugs.  If you can reproduce, try again with the JIT 
turned off to see if the problem goes away. Turn off JIT like this:

eclipse -vm d:\jre\bin\java -vmargs -Djava.compiler=NONE
